title: Automate bitcoin trading insights with 10-exchange liquidity data and GPT-4.1 analysis
description:
**Create your own Bitcoin Liquidity Exchange Channel with an AI Agent‚Äîfully integrated with 10 major centralized exchanges.**

This workflow acts as a **liquidity intelligence agent**, connecting multiple exchange order books into a unified dataset, then applying AI analysis to generate actionable trading insights. It‚Äôs the ultimate tool for **Bitcoin traders, analysts, community managers**, and **researchers** who need **cross-exchange liquidity monitoring**‚Äîdelivered instantly through Telegram.

---

## üîå Supported Exchanges (Integrated)

1. Binance
2. Coinbase
3. Bybit
4. MEXC
5. Gate.io
6. Bitget
7. OKX
8. Kraken
9. HTX (Huobi)
10. Crypto.com

---

## üåü What Makes This Workflow Special?

This isn‚Äôt just raw order book data‚Äîit‚Äôs an **AI-powered aggregator** that:

* Fetches **BTC/USDT order books** (up to 5000 levels deep) from 10 exchanges
* **Normalizes & merges** liquidity data into a single view
* Uses **GPT-4.1 or GPT-4.1-mini** to detect liquidity clusters, imbalances, and support/resistance
* Generates **two structured outputs**:

  * **Liquidity Report** (raw snapshots from all exchanges)
  * **AI Trading Brief** (intraday + weekly signals)
* Publishes insights directly into a **Telegram channel**

---

## üîç What You Can Do

üìä **Cross-Exchange Liquidity View**

* Monitor total liquidity depth across top 10 exchanges
* Spot hidden bid/ask clusters and weak order book levels

‚ö° **Real-Time Signals**

* Detect when liquidity evaporates at key price points
* Receive intraday + weekly trading briefs

üì¢ **Community Ready**

* Run your own public or private Telegram channel with automated liquidity updates

---

## ‚úÖ Example Alerts

* *‚ÄúBTC liquidity depth update: $30M bid wall forming at $62,000 across Binance & OKX.‚Äù*
* *‚ÄúAsk-side liquidity dropped 20% in the last hour on Bybit + Coinbase.‚Äù*
* *‚ÄúDaily summary: Cross-exchange liquidity balanced, net inflow +3.2%.‚Äù*
* *‚ÄúLiquidity cluster detected: strong support between $61,800 ‚Äì $62,150.‚Äù*

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Create a Telegram Bot**

   * Use [@BotFather](https://t.me/botfather) to generate a bot token
   * Add the bot to your channel and get the channel ID

2. **Configure API Keys**

   * OpenAI API Key (GPT-4.1 or GPT-4.1-mini)
   * Telegram Bot Token + Channel ID

3. **Import Workflow into n8n**

   * Add credentials in the **Set** node (no hardcoding in HTTP nodes)
   * Configure schedule trigger (15m, hourly, daily, etc.)

4. **Deploy & Test**

   * Run the workflow and confirm liquidity + AI insights appear in Telegram

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Architecture

* **AI Brain** ‚Üí GPT-4.1 or GPT-4.1-mini
* **Data Sources** ‚Üí 10 centralized exchanges (BTC/USDT order books)
* **Data Normalization** ‚Üí Unified liquidity dataset
* **Outputs** ‚Üí

  * Liquidity Report (raw exchange stats)
  * AI Trading Brief (signals + summaries)
* **Delivery** ‚Üí Telegram Channel

---

## üìù Included Sticky Notes

* **System Overview** (workflow purpose & design)
* **Exchange Data Integration** (order book depth per CEX)
* **Setup Guide** (Telegram + API keys)
* **Customization Notes** (change frequency, extend signals)
* **Legal Disclaimer** (AI analysis, not financial advice)

---

**Your Bitcoin liquidity insights‚Äîunified, AI-analyzed, and delivered in real time to Telegram.**
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
